channel.title: a39sood on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in a39sood on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Aryan Sood
item.description: Hello, I am a Aryan Sood and I’m in 2nd year Physics and Astronomy. I am a aspiring researcher that is hoping to contribute to Quantum Physics research. With my previous experience as an research assistant in ultra-fast laser optics I hope to be an asset to the the team!
